statements: DELETE FROM patient_diagnostic_results WHERE patient_id = 1 AND test_result > 100
DELETE FROM patient_diagnostic_results WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%Cancer%'
DELETE FROM patient_diagnostic_results WHERE diagnostic_test_id IN (SELECT diagnostic_test_id FROM diagnostic_tests WHERE test_type = 'Blood Test')
DELETE FROM PatientTests WHERE patient_id = 1 AND test_date = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM PatientTests WHERE test_name = 'Blood Test';
DELETE FROM TrendAnalysis WHERE trend_description LIKE '%positive%';
DELETE FROM PatientDiagnosticTests WHERE patient_id = 100 AND test_date < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM TestTrends WHERE trend_id IN (SELECT trend_id FROM TestTrends WHERE trend_value < 10);
DELETE FROM TreatmentPlans WHERE patient_id = (SELECT patient_id FROM PatientDiagnosticTests WHERE test_result = 'Abnormal') AND treatment_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE tr FROM test_results tr JOIN patient_demographics pd ON tr.patient_id = pd.patient_id WHERE pd.gender = 'Male';
DELETE ta FROM trend_analysis ta JOIN test_results tr ON ta.result_id = tr.result_id WHERE tr.test_type = 'Blood Test';
DELETE FROM TestResult WHERE result_id IN (SELECT result_id FROM TrendAnalysis WHERE trend_value > 0.5);
DELETE FROM Patient WHERE patient_id IN (SELECT patient_id FROM TestResult WHERE result_value < 50);
